metadata.title: CVE-2020-14344 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An integer overflow leading to a heap-buffer overflow was found in The XInput Method (XIM) client was implemented in libX11 before version 1.6.10.As per upstream this is security relevant when setuid programs call XIMclient functions while running with elevated privileges. No such programsare shipped with Red Hat Enterprise Linux.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-14344` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libx11-6 - 2:1.6.3-1ubuntu2.2
libx11-data - 2:1.6.3-1ubuntu2.2
libx11-xcb1 - 2:1.6.3-1ubuntu2.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libx11 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.6.3-1ubuntu2.2').
